titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for recalling proclamations and orders not agreeable to the acts of navigation and for encouragement of trade.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 30th day of September, 1667."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
